title: HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan With Shining Transparent Fan Rib for Wedding,Church,Festival,Dance,Party Prom,Club,EDM Accessory Black
descriptions:
Introducing the HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan, the perfect accessory to keep you cool and stylish at any event! Made with high-quality glitter fabric and a transparent fan rib, this fan is designed to shine and sparkle, making you stand out in the crowd. 

With its compact size of 23cm (9.05inch) in length and 42cm (16.5inch) when opened, it is easy to carry and fits perfectly in your handbag or clutch. The fan is incredibly easy to open and operates with a low noise level, ensuring a hassle-free experience. Plus, it is lightweight and sturdy, providing you with long-lasting comfort and enjoyment.

This fan is suitable for a wide range of occasions, including weddings, churches, festivals, dances, parties, proms, clubs, and EDM events. It is also a must-have accessory for raves, pride celebrations, techno nights, freaky parties, cosplay events, discos, and concerts. 

But the HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan doesn't stop there! It can also be used as a wall decoration, a summer accessory for the beach or seaside, and a stylish addition to your night out ensemble. 

Available in a sleek black color, this fan features colorful shining glitter fabric that will catch the eye of everyone around you. Its unique and elegant design is perfect for adding a touch of glamour to any outfit or event.
